title: Bloomberg Markets: Why Market Isn't Reacting to Drama
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Why Market Isn't Reacting to Drama
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Bradford B McMillan Chief Investment Officer Commonwealth Financial Network Discussing why the market isn't reacting to drama as fundmentals and earnings remain strong.
